author: Anand Kumar Patel
description: A refreshing, creamy mango shake made with ripe mangoes, milk, and sugar â€” perfect for hot summer days.
ingredients: 1 scoop vanilla ice cream (optional, for richer taste)
instructions: Add chopped mangoes, sugar, and milk into a blender.
Blend everything until smooth and creamy.
Add ice cubes or ice cream if desired, then blend again for 10 seconds.
Pour into a glass and garnish with small mango pieces or mint leaves.
Serve chilled and enjoy your refreshing mango shake!
